name: VirtualPitBoy
description:
Created in 48 hours for the Hardcore Punk Game Jam
August 17th-19th 2018.
Score points with kinetic energy! Push, climb and surf!
5 minute play session.

https://itch.io/jam/hardcore-punk-jam

Controls:  FPS Mouse Look
WASD for movement, spacebar to shove.

Art, Animation, Scripting, and Design by Austin @ Sadware.

Music:
"Kersed" by Ceremony. Cover by Ricky Hinojos
"Kabuki Girl" by Descendents.  Cover by "Punk Goes 8-Bit"
"Fashion Zombies" by The Aquabats.  Cover by "Punk Goes 8-Bit"
